results.content:
1. no response to questions.
2. Course material outdated, having to research, update to correct the error.
3. When performing certain function, did not explain some prereq steps must be taken thus lead to unclear explanation.
4. Only positive about it is I have to google some material thus lead to further knowledge of Joomla, but then, I don't really need this course.

results.content: Loved the class! Only had a few issues getting joomla installed and the template uploaded, but everything else went great. So excited to launch my new crowdfunding platform.
results.content_html: Loved the class! Only had a few issues getting joomla installed and the template uploaded, but everything else went great. So excited to launch my new crowdfunding platform.

results.content: I wanted to design a website that will be just like kickstarter but the information isn't comprehensive enough as displayed on the title.

results.content: I highly recommend you to take this course if you are interested in learning about Joomla CMS. I was looking for simple ways to create my blog and manage content on a daily basis and this course made my life easy by following these simple videos.
results.content_html: I highly recommend you to take this course if you are interested in learning about Joomla CMS. I was looking for simple ways to create my blog and manage content on a daily basis and this course made my life easy by following these simple videos.

results.content: For anyone wanting to start a website or a crowdfunding page. You should not even be second guessing who to go to. With no Joomla experience whatsoever Mathew helped me in no time to set up a crowdfunding site. The skills can be used for setting up a normal website too. Mathew is EXTREMELY helpful and answers very quickly. He goes far beyond expectation to make sure everything works and is going smooth for you. Don't wait, just join his course you won't regret it. Course very easy to follow and it covers so many aspects in such a sharp and concise way. Thanks Mathew!
results.content_html: For anyone wanting to start a website or a crowdfunding page. You should not even be second guessing who to go to. With no Joomla experience whatsoever Mathew helped me in no time to set up a crowdfunding site. The skills can be used for setting up a normal website too. Mathew is EXTREMELY helpful and answers very quickly. He goes far beyond expectation to make sure everything works and is going smooth for you. Don't wait, just join his course you won't regret it. Course very easy to follow and it covers so many aspects in such a sharp and concise way. Thanks Mathew!

results.content: If you are interested in creating a crowdfunding platform this is the class for you.  It is amazing that such a complex process is broken down into simple, clear steps.  The instructor, Mathew Tamin, is both highly competent and committed to making sure students are successful.  As an individual who knows very little, I found Mr. Tamin to be extremely helpful and supportive.  Based on my experience, I will be taking many Udemy courses.   Yale Wishnick

results.content: Great course.  It is now 2020 and Joomla is up to 3.9, plus the JGive component has changed.  Would be great to see an update.

results.content: This course walks you through some of the basic questions and development strategies needed to create a crowdfunding site.
